{"id":1075702747,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1697357312,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1075702747/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Losers of the Circular Game","memory":"8.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> circularGameLosers(int n, int k) {\n        vector<int> losers;\n        bool receivedBall[n];\n        memset(receivedBall,false,sizeof(receivedBall));\n        // Simulating the Circular Game\n        for(int i=0,j=1;;i=(i+j*k)%n,j++) if(receivedBall[i]) break;\n        else receivedBall[i]=true;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++) if(!receivedBall[i]) losers.emplace_back(i+1); // 1-indexed\n        return losers;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-losers-of-the-circular-game","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
